issue.title: Installation from source in Indigo: gazebo_ros_pkgs and sandia_hand

content.raw: I wrote this when I was young, foolish, and didn't know how to report errors... judging from a source install, it looks like whatever problem I ran into is fixed. Although my past self may have been trying to install DRCSim using a mix of sources and debians, which is not what the tutorial suggests anyway...
content.html: I wrote this when I was young, foolish, and didn't know how to report errors... judging from a source install, it looks like whatever problem I ran into is fixed.
